title: Charley junior's schooldays
creator_credit: John Halas, Joy Batchelor and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
brief_description:
Episode number 7 of Series “Charley”.
Features the Education Act of 1944 and the improvements which may be expected in British education as a result of the Act. Charley Junior, a cartoon character, is eager to know about this future life. A nurse tells him about his school days; the different types of schools he will attend; the increase in education facilities and improvements in method; plans for the training of teachers and the construction of new schools. Voice: Max Adrian.
creator_credit_for_label: John Halas, Joy Batchelor and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
